title: What are the rules and techniques for using magnetism to treat various diseases?
first_phrase: This text is a section on the treatment of illnesses through magnetism, with an emphasis on recognizing concentrations of magnetic force in the body and determining the appropriate finger to use for passes based on the affected sense. The author discusses the signs and symptoms associated with different concentrations, and how to recognize whether a disease is caused by a physical or spiritual ailment. Additionally, the text covers the general practices for treating illnesses through magnetism and discusses some of the specific diseases that can be treated using this method. The last 200 tokens mainly focus on the rules for performing passes, including the principle of not directly touching the affected area and how to use finger passes to alleviate symptoms.

last_phrase: In conclusion, magnetic healing, when done correctly, can be a powerful tool for relieving physical and mental suffering.
